articles.title: European Space Agency Shows Off Concept for Martian Sample Picker-Upper - Futurism
articles.description: The European Space Agency has shown off a concept for a giant eight-feet-long robotic arm that is designed to pick up samples of Martian soil.
articles.content:
It's literally picking up where Perseverance left off.
